translation.en: [Tia] Hey, girl.
They reek. [chuckles]
[Tia] Do you have her shoes?
[Nu'u] I thought I was done with football.
translation.zh: ‎我以为我不会再打橄榄球了

translation.en: And then I was just working at Walmart.
Just making minimum wage.
Okay.
I was just checking receipts at the door...
Big old dude, checking receipts, like...
I was just, like, "Man, I don't wanna keep doing this."
That's when I came to Laney. I just showed up one day.
translation.zh:
‎我就是那个时候去了兰尼
‎有一天就那么去了

translation.en: [Rejzohn] I wake up at 5:30, leave by 6:00,
drive two hours every morning with traffic.
translation.zh: ‎每天早上在拥挤的交通中开2个小时

translation.en: And then get to Laney, start class, practice,
translation.zh: ‎然后到达兰尼 开始上课、练习

translation.en: and then come home, lay down, go to sleep, wake up and do it all over again.
translation.zh: ‎再回家 躺下睡觉 醒来 周而复始

translation.en: Every day.
But, I mean, this is something I gotta do so I can have a better future for myself.
translation.zh:
‎但这是我必须做的
‎这样才能拥有更好的未来

translation.en: [Dior] I'm out here again, left in the cold.
It's that feeling I hate 'cause it makes me feel weak.
translation.zh: ‎这是我讨厌的感觉 让我觉得软弱

translation.en: And I hate feeling weak. I felt weak for so long.
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌软弱 过去已经软弱了太久

translation.en: I can do this myself, too. I don't need no handouts.
translation.zh: ‎我自己也可以做到 我不需要施舍

translation.en: It can get frustrating at times 'cause you don't know what's gonna happen.
translation.zh:
‎有时候是会觉得沮丧
‎因为不知道未来会如何

translation.en: I need to get the fuck up outta here.
[RJ] I just graduated high school and I don't have any money,
I don't have any scholarship offers.
I was like, "Maybe I should just join the military."
So, I was like, "No, fuck this. I'm gonna go play football."
translation.zh: ‎但又想：“不行 我要打橄榄球”

translation.en: I fit in 'cause I work my ass off.
translation.zh: ‎我很合适 因为我拼命努力

translation.en: And that's what we do at Laney, we work our asses off.
translation.zh: ‎在兰尼就是这样 我们拼命努力训练

translation.en: [Brad] You hear about the tough grind of JUCO football.
translation.zh: ‎人们都听说过大专橄榄球的残酷磨炼

translation.en: Laney College is the tough grind of JUCO football.
translation.zh:
‎（兰尼学院） ‎兰尼学院就是
‎大专橄榄球的残酷磨练场

translation.en: [man 1] The California junior college system is different.
There aren't scholarships, there aren't dorms.
[Brad] They have to find their own housing, which can be very pricey in California.
translation.zh: ‎他们得自己找地方住 在加州这很贵

translation.en: I mean, if you can't afford $3,000 worth of rent around here, it's rough.
translation.zh:
‎如果在这里你付不起三千美金的房租
‎那就很艰难了

translation.en: [Vince] Guys used to sleep in the locker room
translation.zh: ‎我们以前有学生睡在更衣室

translation.en: and we didn't even know it.
I got some guys that didn't eat for two days.
[Adam] There's dudes on this team that are coming from nothing.
If you weren't playing football, you wouldn't be going to college at all.
translation.zh: ‎如果不打橄榄球 根本不能上大专

translation.en: [Josh] Just love the gritty, grindy-type players, and that's what we get.
translation.zh:
‎我就喜欢这种坚韧、努力的球员
‎我们这的球员都是如此

translation.en: [man 2] The working-class kids are the tough kids.
translation.zh:
‎工薪阶层的孩子
‎就是那种更坚强的小孩

translation.en: Can't play this game and not be tough.
[man 3] With community college, you got kids having kids.
translation.zh: ‎在社区大专院校 有的学生有孩子

translation.en: You gotta worry about housing, eating, academics.
translation.zh: ‎要同时操心住房、吃饭和学业

translation.en: [Josh] If we don't take care of business, they're not gonna get out.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们不做好工作
‎他们就无法离开这里

translation.en: They're gonna be here working at AutoZone.
translation.zh: ‎他们会在这里的汽配店上班

translation.en: [man 1] Those guys that have the spirit to maybe sleep in their car
to play football, they're gonna make it.
translation.zh: ‎坚持打橄榄球的人 一定能成功

translation.en: They're gonna go on to make something of themselves
translation.zh: ‎他们会走上实现自我的道路

translation.en: because you have to be a bit resourceful.
translation.zh: ‎因为这靠的就是解决问题的能力

translation.en: You have to figure things out on your own.
They have to try harder, and that's Oakland.
translation.zh: ‎他们要加倍努力 这就是奥克兰

translation.en: [commentator 1] It all comes down to this last play.
translation.zh:
‎（2018年12月8日
‎加州社区大学锦标赛） ‎终于来到这最后一次进攻

translation.en: It must go into the end zone.
[commentator 2] What a game, Jason, I'm telling you.
translation.zh: ‎比赛真精彩 杰森 我说真的

translation.en: Laney came out of nowhere. It was a real surprise.
translation.zh: ‎兰尼是匹黑马 让人惊喜

translation.en: [commentator 1] No one thought the team from Oakland had a shot.
translation.zh: ‎没人想到奥克兰来的球队有机会获胜

translation.en: Last play!
Dolman... is gonna run.
[commentator 1] That's it!
The Laney College Eagles are the 2018 State Champions!
translation.zh:
‎兰尼学院老鹰队
‎获得2018州冠军！

translation.en: [Brad] Laney was one of the great stories last year.
translation.zh: ‎兰尼的胜利是去年最棒的故事之一

translation.en: An amazing story.
Laney was not a very good football program 10, 15 years ago,
translation.zh:
‎（《大专橄榄球》出版人
‎布拉德荷赛斯） ‎兰尼的橄榄球项目
‎在10到15年前没有特别好

translation.en: but Coach Beam has built a program from the ground level up.
translation.zh: ‎但比姆教练从零打造了一个项目

translation.en: John Beam's a heck of a football coach.
translation.zh: ‎约翰比姆是个非常棒的橄榄球教练

translation.en: [commentator 1] Tell us about the philosophy
Coach Beam preached all season to get you here.
translation.zh:
‎一整个赛季把队伍带到这个位置
‎所宣扬的理念

translation.en: Only team that could beat us is us.
translation.zh: ‎能打败我们队伍的只有我们自己

translation.en: He made sure that we was ready to play,
translation.zh: ‎他确保我们都已为比赛做好准备

translation.en: but he always told us it wasn't him, it was us.
translation.zh:
‎但他总是对我们说
‎做准备的是我们 不是他

translation.en: Man, he's a great coach.
One of the best coaches I ever had. I love Coach Beam.
translation.zh:
‎我遇到过最好的教练之一
‎我爱比姆教练

translation.en: [commentator 3] Congratulations to the 2018
CCA state champions, the Laney College Eagles.
translation.zh: ‎CCA州冠军 兰尼学院老鹰队

translation.en: [Coach Beam] I didn't know what to do.
I started running like a crazy guy around the field.
translation.zh: ‎我开始像疯子一样在场上奔跑

translation.en: Jump on my DB coach...
translation.zh: ‎跳到我们防守后卫教练的身上…

translation.en: change my direction, ran up into the stand,
translation.zh: ‎又变换方向 跑到看台上

translation.en: because I wanted to find my wife. I wanted to find my family.
translation.zh: ‎因为我想找我妻子 找到我的家人

translation.en: You do something for 40 years...
something you love...
I put in hours of time on the field every day with everybody else's kids...
translation.zh:
‎我每天长时间和别人的孩子
‎在球场上待着

translation.en: And so, for me, I ran up to the field, found my wife, hugged her, my daughters.
translation.zh:
‎所以我跑到场边
‎找到我的妻子 拥抱她和我的女儿们

translation.en: And, you know...
football is about family.
translation.zh: ‎（年度教练 约翰比姆） ‎…橄榄球讲究的就是家人纽带

translation.en: So every year, everything starts over again, a whole new family.
translation.zh:
‎每年 一切都要重新开始
‎一个全新的家庭 ‎（兰尼学院 州冠军-2018）

translation.en: Give me one, ready, ready.
-Give me two, ready, ready. -[group claps]
Today...
is my 40th year starting coaching football.
So I've been doing it 40 years.
I'm as excited today as I was in 1979.
translation.zh: ‎但我今天和1979年的我一样兴奋

translation.en: Last year, phenomenal season, magic ride.
translation.zh: ‎去年是个一举成名的赛季 出奇制胜

translation.en: Those that you were there,
remember that feeling when the clock ran out,
the quarterback ran, we tackled him, right, Ryan?
translation.zh:
‎四分卫跑动 我们拦截了他
‎对吗 莱恩？

translation.en: How did it feel? Unbelievable, right, Baras?
translation.zh: ‎感觉如何？难以置信吧 巴拉斯？

translation.en: -You've never done that before. -[Barasa] No.
-Never. -[Barasa] Never.
[Coach Beam] It's great, that feeling, but you gotta make it come back.
translation.zh: ‎那种感觉很棒 但你得找回它

translation.en: It's gonna be fun today, man.
translation.zh: ‎（66号 攻击线锋 努道加瓦） ‎今天会很有趣的 伙计

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Kenny, why is your chin strap not buttoned?
translation.zh: ‎肯尼 你的下颚搭扣为什么没扣上？

translation.en: Kenny, why is it the same thing every day with you, my man?
translation.zh: ‎肯尼 为什么每天都这样 老兄？

translation.en: Come on, young fella.
-How are you, sir? How you feeling? -[Dior] Good.
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗 先生？怎么样？
‎-很好

translation.en: -Good. Amazing, Coach. -All right.
translation.zh:
‎-好极了 教练
‎-好的 ‎（4号 外接手 迪奥沃克斯科特）

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Come on, Kenny.
You have all the ability in the world and your chin strap's still not buttoned.
translation.zh:
‎你什么能力都有
‎但就是不扣你的下颚搭扣

translation.en: [Kenny] My bad.
[player] Need a crowd. Kind of empty right now.
[Coach Beam] Let's go. We're right here, boys. Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我们开始了 小伙子们

translation.en: Today, we're letting it loose.
Let it go. Don't over think it right now. Just play.
translation.zh:
‎放手去发挥 现在不要多想
‎只管打就行

translation.en: We'll correct the mistakes tomorrow, right, Timmy?
translation.zh: ‎我们明天再纠正错误 对吧 提米？

translation.en: But today, get off the ball, have fun and be violent.
translation.zh: ‎今天就放开球好好享受 释放暴力

translation.en: Show us what you can do today. Here we go, one clap, ready.
translation.zh:
‎今天让我们看看你们的本事
‎来吧 拍一下 准备好

translation.en: -[Coach Beam] Get a break, boys. -[cheering]
translation.zh: ‎去享受这个机会吧 孩子们

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Let's go, let's go.
[Vince] We don't have the luxury of having the same team that we had last year.
translation.zh: ‎我们没法奢求和去年拥有相同的队伍

translation.en: This is a whole new team and each year you're developing kids
translation.zh:
‎这是个全新的队伍
‎每年都要训练孩子们 ‎（外线卫教练 文思波德隆）

translation.en: to be great. But right now, we're just average.
translation.zh:
‎（外线卫教练 文思波德隆） ‎成长为优秀的球员
‎但现在他们还很平庸

translation.en: We're not great yet.
It's RJ, coach, RJ! Close enough.
translation.zh: ‎放开 伙计们 好样的

translation.en: Let's go, O.
We only returned 22 players.
D-line wise, we got two guys returning.
We're trying to mesh 90 different individuals.
translation.zh:
‎我们要努力让90个不同的个体
‎相互配合

translation.en: Ninety individuals that you're trying to make units.
translation.zh:
‎90个人要在你的指导下
‎成为团队的一员

translation.en: If we can overcome that, we'll have a chance to be good.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们能克服这一点 ‎就有机会成为好球队

translation.en: Nice job, AJ. Good job.
It's RJ, coach, RJ! My... Close enough.
translation.zh: ‎是RJ 教练 RJ！差一点就对了

translation.en: God damn it. Get it together! We gotta be faster than this, guys.
translation.zh:
‎该死 打起精神！
‎现在不够快 伙计们

translation.en: Quarterback situation's a bit hairy right now.
translation.zh: ‎四分卫有点吓人 ‎（外接手教练 亚当罗宾森）

translation.en: Carson is a prototypical NFL quarterback.
translation.zh: ‎卡森是个典型的橄榄球联盟四分卫

translation.en: Naturally spins the ball.
translation.zh: ‎（13号 四分卫 卡森亚拉特） ‎自然地转球

translation.en: Carson's got a bicep tendonitis problem right now.
translation.zh: ‎卡森的二头肌有肌腱炎 ‎（四分卫教练 罗伯特克罗利）

translation.en: But we still think he's gonna be really good.
translation.zh: ‎但我们依然认为他会成为好球员

translation.en: KJ's probably the most versatile
translation.zh:
‎（12号 四分卫
‎肯尼KJ加德纳） ‎KJ可能是最全能的

translation.en: with the ability to run and throw, make guys miss.
translation.zh: ‎他能跑能投 会让别人丢球

translation.en: [man] Never even looked down field.
[Coach Beam] KJ's a wildcard.
You gotta think about catch the ball, nest the ball, roll.
translation.zh: ‎（3号 四分卫 莱恩麦齐） ‎你得想着接球、护球、滚动

translation.en: [man] Ryan was our wily veteran for sure.
translation.zh: ‎莱恩绝对算是我们经验丰富的老队员

translation.en: Third year in college, second year with the program.
translation.zh: ‎大专三年级 参加球队第二年

translation.en: When Ryan goes in the game, there's not gonna be a surprise.
translation.zh: ‎莱恩一上场 就不会有意外

translation.en: We have a lot of faith in him. [Coach Beam] There he is! Got him, nice catch!
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得我们很信任他
‎-他在这！抓住他 拦得好！

translation.en: It's gonna be a new challenge,
but we have some big-time players to make the difference.
translation.zh:
‎但我们有一流的球员
‎会有非凡的表现

translation.en: So for instance, Rej.
What we had, six plays?
translation.zh: ‎怎么样了 我们第六次进攻？

translation.en: So bogus.
[Coach Beam] Rejzohn, he is a natural corner.
They gotta throw a perfect ball every time.
translation.zh: ‎他们每次都得投出完美的球

translation.en: He's 6'3", he's got a phenomenal competitive nature about him.
translation.zh: ‎他身高1米9 有极具竞争力的天赋

translation.en: Tell him to throw the ball. Tell them to throw the ball.
He could be a Sunday player.
[Josh] His brother went to Oregon State after one year with us.
translation.zh:
‎他的哥哥在我们这待了一年后
‎去了俄勒冈州立大学

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Get up.
He's better than his brother.
translation.zh: ‎他比哥哥更强 ‎（防守协调员 乔什拉莫斯）

translation.en: [player] Come on!
Here now, here now, here now!
[Rejzohn] Yeah!
[Rejzohn yelling] Yeah!
[player] Fuckin' talk.
[Vince] His ass is so cocky right now.
It's gonna be a lot of jaw jacking, lot of chattering.
All that shit they was talking. All that shit they was talking.
It's the type of guys we bring in.
[Coach Beam] Come on, now. Hey, get inside. There you go! Nice one!
translation.zh: ‎快点 嘿 去里面 对了！好！

translation.en: [Josh] We don't have guys coming in from Tennessee, North Carolina,
translation.zh:
‎我们没有田纳西州
‎和北卡罗来纳州来的队员

translation.en: like some of the other junior colleges.
translation.zh: ‎这一点和一些其他大专院校不同

translation.en: [Nu'u] Nuts all over your face, boy!
Let's go, boy!
We're local East Bay.
translation.zh: ‎我们就是土生土长的东湾人

translation.en: Play with a chip on our shoulder and punch you in the mouth.
translation.zh: ‎随时准备干架 揍别人的脸

translation.en: [Nu'u] Rub my nuts all over his face.
To some degree, it's hard to build a consistent culture
translation.zh: ‎某种程度上来说很难促成统一的文化

translation.en: because you are constantly having guys leave.
It's almost like guys are like mercenaries.
[Vince] You don't know who's gonna miss the bus.
You don't know who's gonna get dropped from a class,
so every game is an adventure.
[Coach Beam] No discipline.
What did I say not to do?
Bro, we got till Friday to fix some shit.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 周五之前我们得解决一些问题

translation.en: [Coach Beam] That's bullshit!
You just got your ass kicked!
That was embarrassing.
[Rejzohn] There, poor connection.
-Let me see. I gotta get him back. -[video chat ringing]
There you go.
[chuckling] Look at that nigga's haircut.
[Nahshon] All them new shirts y'all got, I need them.
translation.zh: ‎你的所有新衬衣 我都要了

translation.en: We got chicken on the back of them motherfuckers.
Not even an eagle.
This is a chicken, nigga.
That don't look like no eagle.
[Rejzohn] Look at Beam.
[Coach Beam] Oh, my gosh. What are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天 你在干什么？

translation.en: [interviewer] Coach Beam had a nickname for you two.
translation.zh: ‎比姆教练给你们俩取了外号

translation.en: -Stick and Pole. -[interviewer] What does that mean?
Uh, we were just two skinny dudes.
But I was Stick and then Rej's Pole.
translation.zh: ‎我是棍子 雷吉就是杆子

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Hey! Your brother needs you, man.
[Rejzohn] Oh, my fucking God.
[Coach Beam] That boy thinks he got everything figured out.
translation.zh: ‎那孩子以为自己什么都懂了

translation.en: I didn't realize that you were carrying him so much.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到你为了带他付出这么多

translation.en: Your back must really be good
now that you ain't carrying that boy. I know it's only 160 pounds.
translation.zh:
‎现在背部的健康状况一定很好
‎我知道只有73公斤

translation.en: Hundred and eighty.
[Nahshon] We've always been close and that.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我们一直这么亲密

translation.en: But after my dad passed, I took on that role to make sure I take care of him.
translation.zh:
‎但我父亲过世后
‎我还承担起了照顾他的角色

translation.en: He's a smart kid, he's just hardheaded.
translation.zh: ‎他是个聪明的孩子 不会感情用事

translation.en: I think once he learns how to listen to people, the sky's the limit for him.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得只要他学会聆听
‎前途将不可估量

translation.en: Rej's the little brother...
in all ways.
Sonny was the one that drove, Rej just slept in the car, right?
translation.zh:
‎索尼是要开车的那个
‎雷吉是睡在车里 对吧？

translation.en: Now, Rej's gotta drive.
[Coach Beam] Now one person's already missed class today in math, right, Rej?
translation.zh:
‎好了 今天有个人
‎已经错过了数学课 对吧 雷吉？

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Nobody pays for my gas, but all right.
translation.zh: ‎没人为我付汽油钱 但没关系

translation.en: Rej, you keep acting like... You know what? Don't come.
translation.zh: ‎雷吉 你再这样…你就别来了

translation.en: [Rejzohn] I'm gonna come, I love football and I love Laney.
translation.zh:
‎我会来的
‎我喜欢橄榄球 我喜欢兰尼

translation.en: -I hope you love math class. -[Rejzohn] I love class.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 我希望你喜欢数学课
‎-我喜欢上课

translation.en: -I hope you love math. -I missed one class, I had no gas money.
translation.zh:
‎-我希望你喜欢数学
‎-我错过了一节课 因为我没钱加油

translation.en: I'm sorry, nobody pays for my gas but me and I'm unemployed.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我只能靠自己挣汽油钱
‎但我没有工作

translation.en: Come on, brother.
Y'all know I come from Stockton. Shit's hard.
translation.zh:
‎你们都知道我来自斯托克顿
‎生活不易

translation.en: I've been at Laney for... a year. This is going on my second season.
translation.zh:
‎我在兰尼待了…一年了
‎这是我的第二个赛季

translation.en: Two years straight with no touchdowns.
I wanted to go somewhere where we were hated.
translation.zh: ‎我曾想去个被人讨厌的地方

translation.en: That's kind of what Laney is. Nobody likes Laney.
translation.zh: ‎兰尼就是这样 没人喜欢兰尼

translation.en: We're the bad kids, the scrappy ones.
translation.zh: ‎我们是坏孩子 整天打架

translation.en: -[Rejzohn groans in frustration] -Do it again, Rej.
[Rejzohn] I'm not too worried about anybody I'm going up against.
I'm just gonna go at you.
I just attack football differently from everybody else on the field.
translation.zh: ‎我和场上任何人处理球的方式都不同

translation.en: I don't give up nothing. Nothing.
Don't come out here unless you really want the smoke.
Rej being ranked number one DB in the state, number three in the country,
translation.zh:
‎雷吉是州内排名第一的防守后卫
‎全国排名第三

translation.en: it's a lot of pressure, but he's a competitor.

Can I put my hand on it first?
Look, can I put my...

You know what...

translation.en: Merle, what'd you think?
Y'all are so boring.
I get paid to do what I love.
I mean, it's just phenomenal. I'm just so lucky.
So, this is Havenscourt.
This is where I first started.
I think within the first week I saw a cop chase a guy out here with a gun
translation.zh:
‎我记得第一周我就看到
‎一个警察在这里追一个持枪的人

translation.en: and I taught some of the biggest drug dealers in Oakland here.

translation.en: And I grew up here. I mean, I started teaching here
translation.zh: ‎我在这里长大 我开始在这里教书时

translation.en: when I was 22 years old.
So Oakland is divided by this freeway, 580.
Flatland's below 580, hills above.
translation.zh: ‎580下面是平原 上面是山丘

translation.en: Up here,
back in the '80s and '90s is where the Hells Angels hung out.
translation.zh:
‎这块区域在80和90年代
‎是地狱天使帮活跃的地带

translation.en: The Hells Angels actually have their headquarters in East Oakland.
translation.zh: ‎地狱天使的总部其实就在东奥克兰

translation.zh: ‎在我成长的年代 它的形象是狂野

translation.en: rough, but also deep, beautiful and vibrant.

translation.en: Oakland's very well known for the Black Panthers being founded here.

‎奥克兰因为黑豹党在这里创建
‎而非常出名

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Black is beautiful ♪
[chanting] ♪ Free Huey! ♪
[Lukas] Oakland has produced a lot of trailblazers.
People who have led movements who have led to huge innovations
translation.zh:
‎（奥克兰为了孩子组织执行董事
‎卢卡斯布雷克米斯纳） ‎这里有人领导运动 引领巨大的创新

translation.en: and changes in how our society looks and feels.
I know from experience that the people can transform society
translation.zh: ‎我从经验中知道 人们可以改变社会

translation.en: and can surely free political prisoners and prisoners of war.
translation.zh: ‎肯定可以让政治犯和战犯重获自由

translation.en: [Coach Beam] You look at the talent that comes out of this city,
translation.zh: ‎看看从这座城市走出来的人才

translation.en: whether it's actors or singers or athletes.
translation.zh: ‎无论是演员、歌手还是运动员

translation.en: This city produces talented people.
[commentator] Rickey Henderson, no contest, steals third base.
translation.zh: ‎里奇亨德森 没有争议 盗三垒

translation.en: But Oakland has gone through this whole redevelopment and gentrification
translation.zh: ‎但是奥克兰可能在过去的十年间

translation.en: over the last, maybe, ten years.
The black community's being forced out, moving further out into the suburbs.
translation.zh:
‎黑人社区被强制迁出
‎搬入更远的郊区

translation.en: More hipsters, yuppies moving into town.
In the '80s, you know, people didn't wanna live here.
translation.zh: ‎在80年代 人们不想住在这里

translation.en: Now, it's so gentrified, you're lucky to get a house for $800,000.
translation.zh:
‎现在这里变得很高端
‎花80万美金买下一幢房子都很幸运

translation.en: [Fred] You see all this construction? So they're changing Oakland.
translation.zh:
‎看到这些建设工地了吗？
‎它们在改造着奥克兰

translation.en: Everything is being re-done.
translation.zh: ‎（奥克兰警督 弗雷德谢维斯） ‎一切都重造了

translation.en: Oakland is gonna be a completely different city in five years.
translation.zh: ‎奥克兰五年内会变成完全不同的城市

translation.en: [Sakai] It's expensive to live here,
it pushes those of us out that have been here forever
because of the cost of living here, along with the homelessness.
translation.zh:
‎一直在这里生活的我们被迫离开
‎还有无家可归的问题

translation.en: We have a lot of homeless people here.
translation.zh: ‎我们这有很多无家可归的人

translation.en: [Dorothy] Gentrification has really destabilized a lot of lives.
translation.zh:
‎社区高档化
‎让很多人的生活变得不稳定

translation.en: People feel vulnerable right now
translation.zh:
‎人们现在感觉很脆弱… ‎（奥克兰历史学家 图书馆长
‎多萝西拉扎德）

translation.en: because of the volatility of our real estate market.
translation.zh:
‎（奥克兰历史学家 图书馆长
‎多萝西拉扎德） ‎因为我们的不动产市场很多变

translation.en: A lot of people have moved out of the city which may impact students.
translation.zh:
‎很多人搬出了这座城市
‎这可能会对学生带来影响

translation.en: They have to commute from further away to get to school.
translation.zh: ‎他们上学的通勤距离变得更远

translation.en: [Tammeil] Across the faculty and the staff I know that everybody is
translation.zh: ‎我知道所有员工都多多少少

translation.zh: ‎在挣扎应对湾区高昂的生活成本

translation.en: how expensive it is to live in Oakland.
[Josh] It's been a lot more of a challenge.
If you pull up our roster, our guys aren't just from Oakland, California.

‎拉出我们的队员名单
‎可以看到学生们不止来自加州奥克兰

translation.en: They're from anywhere BART goes.
translation.zh: ‎他们来自湾区地铁通达的各个地方

translation.en: You're taking guys that are going to school, working nights.

translation.en: I mean, you gotta be a tough son of a bitch to play this game.
translation.zh: ‎要打比赛的都是非常顽强的家伙

translation.en: [Coach Beam] We don't provide food, so they have to have jobs.
translation.zh: ‎我们不提供食物 所以他们必须工作

translation.en: So they work security, some drive Uber.
One guy was picking up Lime scooters,

translation.en: and collecting and taking 'em back, and they get paid for moving those around.
translation.zh: ‎回收好送回去 可以拿到搬场费

translation.en: You find ways to get by in Oakland.
translation.zh: ‎总能找到在奥克兰生存的方法

Have we got an order for Will?
Ten-piece classic combo, half barbecue, half lemon.

translation.en: -lemon pepper and Louisiana rub. -Okay.

‎-柠檬胡椒和路易斯安那风味
‎-好

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Work night shift from 8:00 to 12:00. I'm trying to get on my own.

‎晚班从8点到12点
‎我在努力自食其力

translation.en: I don't need no handouts.
Dior is resilient and he's had to be.

translation.en: He's an extremely sharp young man, but he's a battler.

‎他是个很机敏的年轻人
‎但他是个战士

translation.en: I fucking hate this job.
It's the only way I get money right now.
translation.zh: ‎这是我现在赚钱的唯一方法

translation.en: So, I can't complain.
His high school senior year, he had to leave to go to Arkansas

translation.en: to go to school and then come back. It's not been easy.
translation.zh: ‎然后又回来 这很不容易

translation.en: Some stuff happened, I moved to Arkansas with my mom,

‎发生了一些事
‎我和妈妈搬去了阿肯色州

translation.en: so I couldn't showcase my skills for my senior year
translation.zh: ‎所以我没能在高三展现自己的技能

translation.en: and I had interest from Sac State,

translation.en: but they weren't interested in me no more.
I had too much problems going on in my life.
[Coach Beam] So many people have road blocks in their lives, right?
translation.zh:
‎很多人的人生中
‎都会遇到障碍 对吧？

translation.en: And when they see those road blocks, they give up and quit.
translation.zh: ‎他们看到这些障碍时会放弃

translation.en: He hasn't quit.
[Dior] Hey, right now, my main focus is just having a school believe in me
translation.zh:
‎嘿 现在我的重心是
‎要让一家学校相信我

translation.en: to just pull the trigger on me.
Not no prefer walk-on, not no partial scholarship.
translation.zh: ‎不要优先替补位置 不要部分奖学金

translation.en: Give me a full ride and just believe me that I can produce for you.
translation.zh: ‎给我全奖 相信我能有所产出

translation.en: [Coach Beam] I'm serious about these grades.
translation.zh: ‎我是很严肃地在说这些成绩

when Auburn calls to offer you a full scholarship and you can't leave?
translation.zh:
‎奥本大学打电话给你 为你提供全奖
‎结果你毕不了业？

translation.en: [Jeff] You gotta live in reality, guys.
translation.zh: ‎你们得认清现实 伙计们

translation.en: A lot of the times you guys live in a fantasy world,

translation.en: two kinds of fantasies.
One, you think coaches are out to get you. Hold on.

‎（进攻协调员 杰夫哈根森） ‎第一 你们觉得教练们

translation.en: That's one thing that you're wrong about.
Second thing you're wrong about, if you don't face what's really going on,

‎你们搞错的第二件事是

translation.en: it's not gonna affect you later.

translation.en: -[player] My apologies. -Sit down!
So, get that right. Live in reality.
If you're doing poorly in a class, you need to get extra help.
translation.zh: ‎如果你成绩不好 那就去补习

translation.en: There's the writing center, math center, accounting center,
translation.zh: ‎有写作中心、数学中心、会计中心

translation.en: all these places on campus, the library...
translation.zh: ‎学校里有这些资源 还有图书馆

translation.en: You guys ever heard of that?
[Coach Beam] Many of you are here because you had bad habits in high school.
translation.zh:
‎你们很多人来这里
‎是因为高中习惯很差

translation.en: Well, we gotta change those habits.
There's two different ways.
You've heard of the stick and the carrot, right?
You put a carrot in front of a donkey,
tie it on a stick in front of the donkey, it keeps walking,
translation.zh:
‎用棍子把它吊在驴子面前
‎驴子就会一直走

translation.en: trying to eat the carrot. Makes sense?
The donkey moves forward, right?
Or you take a stick and you hit him.
Donkey moves forward 'cause he doesn't wanna get hit.
translation.zh: ‎驴子因为怕被打所以向前走

translation.en: So the carrot is a $50,000 scholarship.
translation.zh: ‎胡萝卜就是五万美金的奖学金

translation.en: The stick is, you run every day, you don't play,
translation.zh: ‎棍子就是每天跑步 不能打比赛

translation.en: we take away playing time, right?
What do you want?
I would think that you'd want the carrot.
Hence, I eat carrots every day.
[Judy] What did you think about what she was doing?
translation.zh: ‎你对她在做的事有什么想法？

translation.en: What did you write?
So what I wrote for this chapter is Renee, she's the hook-up person.
translation.zh: ‎（《纯洁心灵》 朱迪胡安妮塔） ‎这章我写的是 雷内 她是毒贩

translation.en: Renee would give groceries that would cost 100 bucks for 50 bucks.
translation.zh:
‎（英语教师 朱迪胡安妮塔） ‎雷内想花50元来购买
‎本来价值100元的生活用品

translation.en: But why's she stealing when Renee be hooking it up?
translation.zh: ‎但她为什么 ‎在雷内买毒品的时候偷拿呢？

translation.en: Well, if you look here, she thought she hooked her up,
translation.zh: ‎你看这里 她以为她在帮她买东西

translation.en: but then when she walked out, she was arrested.
Damn.
[Gianni] When she gets out of jail,
she's now fully understanding that what she's doing,
translation.zh: ‎她没完全明白自己在做什么

translation.en: stealing and all this, it's not something her family raised her to do.
translation.zh: ‎（练习球员 詹尼加拉维兹） ‎她家人可没教育她去偷东西

translation.en: -[Judy] You ever had a moment like that? -Like what?
translation.zh:
‎-你经历过这种时刻吗？
‎-什么时刻？

translation.en: [Gianni] How your family works to get everything,
give you a certain type of life and then you do something
translation.zh: ‎给你提供某种生活 ‎然后你做了些事情

translation.en: -to fuck that off? -Fuck it up?
-Yeah. -[Gianni] Yeah.
I've felt like that.
[Nu'u] I wasn't good in high school.
I didn't really take school or anything serious.
translation.zh: ‎我根本没把上学什么的当回事

translation.en: After school, I was just stacking boxes and I was just thinking,
translation.zh: ‎毕业后我搬箱子为生 我就想

translation.en: like, "This is not gonna be my career, I need a better career than this."
translation.zh:
‎“这不是我想要的工作
‎我想要更好的工作”

translation.en: That's when they really showed me that football is my way out for school,
translation.zh:
‎那时候才有人告诉我
‎橄榄球可以帮我继续上学

translation.en: not the other way around.
He's always wanted to play football so he can further his education,
translation.zh: ‎他一直想通过打橄榄球继续学业

translation.en: just to get something so he can support our family and, um...
translation.zh: ‎拿到点什么来支持家庭 ‎（努的妻子 提亚道加瓦）

translation.en: Basically, make a living where we aren't struggling.
translation.zh: ‎过上我们不用太辛苦的生活

translation.en: [Nu'u] I haven't even been looking at the time.
[Tia] Come on. I'm gonna be late.
-What happened? It was hella-- -Do you want me to do her or you got it?
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？刚才…
‎-你要我来帮她还是你来？

translation.en: What's it need... Didn't she throw up or something?
The yogurt. She got yogurt all over her.
translation.zh: ‎是酸奶 她身上都是酸奶

translation.en: You want Froot Loops, Eliyana?
translation.zh: ‎想吃水果谷物圈吗 艾莉亚娜？

translation.en: -No, I want-- -It's just Froot Loops, girl.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我想…
‎-就是水果谷物圈 宝贝

translation.en: Captain Crunch?
No.
Hey, there's no more Hamburger Helper.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 牛肉汉堡通心粉没有了

translation.en: I told you to make yours last night.
translation.zh: ‎我昨晚跟你说了 你的要自己做

translation.en: Dang.
-You wanna take mine? -No, it's all right.
I have the Cup of Noodles at work.
You be nice to Eliyana.
[interviewer] How old were you when Eliyana was born?
Seventeen.
Daddy, they got a cool couch.
[Nu'u] It was crazy.
I was crying the whole time she was born, but I wasn't yet...
translation.zh: ‎她出生时我一直在哭 但我还没…

translation.en: I was so scared to hold her.
I didn't wanna break her.
So, I didn't even touch her until, I think, uh, that night.
translation.zh: ‎我记得直到那天晚上我才敢碰她

translation.en: I... I started holding her.
It was the best feeling.
The best feeling ever, holding my little football.
translation.zh: ‎最棒的感觉 抱着我的小橄榄球

translation.en: [Eliyana] Daddy, Daddy.
I'm wrapped up like a burrito.
I can't get out.
[woman] Are those your siblings?
Who?
[woman] The little ones.
They're my daughters.
-Really? -Yeah.
I didn't know you had kids.
-Are you for real? -Yeah.
[woman] That's crazy.
[Nu'u] I didn't think I was ready,
but I took it on anyways 'cause it's my responsibility.
translation.zh:
‎但我还是承担下来了
‎因为这是我的责任

translation.en: Just being there 24/7.
That's all that matters.
Chill over here, okay?
[Coach Beam] Bring 'em down.
Look what he did, you held him. Why are we doing this?
translation.zh: ‎看看他做了什么 你们抱住他 ‎我们为什么这么做？

translation.en: We wanna hold people, right?
Get to the double. We can get in here.
translation.zh: ‎双人拦截 ‎我们可以从这里进去

translation.en: This guy's not part of the run game.
You can see how everything is a domino effect
translation.zh: ‎你们可以看到一旦有错误的操作

translation.en: if we don't do things correctly, okay?
translation.zh: ‎就会引发多米诺效应 明白吗？

translation.en: -We good? -[Robert] Yup.
[Coach Beam] All right, next.
All right, so, this is where I get frustrated--
-Boy, I will hurt you taking my carrots. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎小子 你要是拿我的胡萝卜我就揍你

translation.en: -[player] He wasn't trying to. -All you had to do is ask.
Can I get one?
No, you've tried to take my carrots.
translation.zh: ‎不 你刚想拿走我的胡萝卜

translation.en: You want a carrot? Yeah, you can have a carrot.
translation.zh: ‎你想要胡萝卜？好 你可以拿一个

translation.en: Don't be shy.
Here.
Have my carrots.
-I want one. -[Coach Beam] All right, next.
translation.zh: ‎我就要一个 ‎好了 下一个

translation.en: [Robert] RJ, your route's still too short.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 RJ 你的路线还是太短

translation.en: [RJ] Yeah.
Don't be in a hurry with these routes.
Push for five yards to open this guy up and then bring this in, right?
translation.zh:
‎推5码 让这个家伙放开
‎然后再进来 明白吗？

translation.en: -[Coach Beam] Who's the outside receiver? -[RJ] Me.
-[Coach Beam] Who's "me"? -RJ.
[Coach Beam] Who's been here how many years?
-According to you, 12. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎（6号 外接手 RJ斯登） ‎-按你的说法 12年了
‎-好

translation.en: -How many yards is this route? -Uh, four.
-How many yards is it supposed-- -It's supposed to be six.
-Okay? So... -Yeah.
He got his arm on me and wanted to get off, turn around.
translation.zh: ‎他手臂碰到我 想摆脱并转身

translation.en: I don't wanna hear anything, but do it right.
translation.zh: ‎我不想听任何解释 你要做对

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Come on, brother.
[Robert] RJ, look at your first two steps.
[Coach Beam] He does it all the time.
Like, you've got... You're so explosive and strong.
That first step for you should just be vertical.
[Coach Beam] I tell you that every day.
And every day, what do you do?
Same shit. Why do you wanna do that?
translation.zh: ‎还是老样子 ‎你为什么要这样？

translation.en: This ain't Dance Dance Dance. You ain't on the...
translation.zh:
‎你又不是在玩跳舞游戏
‎不是在那个…

translation.en: -What's the Wii thing when you dance? -Dance Revolution?
translation.zh:
‎-跳舞的那个游戏机叫什么来着？
‎-跳舞毯？

translation.en: Yeah. You ain't doing no dance.
translation.zh: ‎对 你不是在跳舞 老哥

translation.en: -[player] Just Dance. -Dance Revolution.
[Coach Beam] So, look. You run bad routes, it's...
Unless you're RJ, it's on us.
RJ's been here for as long as Rob, so he should know it by now.
translation.zh:
‎RJ和罗伯待的时间一样久
‎所以他现在应该已经明白了

translation.en: The biggest thing with RJ is being teachable, being coachable.
translation.zh: ‎RJ最大的问题就是要能吸收教导

translation.en: He doesn't understand what he's doing is not correct.
Like, his body has this built-in muscle memory that won't change right now.
translation.zh:
‎他的身体已经有了
‎现在无法改变的肌肉记忆

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -[Coach Beam] Hey!
RJ! RJ!
Straight up! All you did is run sideways!
[Vince] At first, John didn't give him a chance,
and he started moving up in the depth chart
translation.zh: ‎然后他在深度图表中排位上移

translation.en: and started making big plays.
[Adam] He makes so many plays, even when he fucks up, you know?
translation.zh: ‎他做过很多进攻 尽管有时会搞砸

translation.en: And he's just got so many different ideas of what to do,
translation.zh: ‎关于该怎么做 他有很多不同的想法

translation.en: not all of which are awesome.
Sometimes you gotta curb his enthusiasm a little bit,
but, I mean, dude busts his ass.
[RJ] Last season was supposed to be my last season.
translation.zh: ‎上个赛季本来是我最后一个赛季

translation.en: I sprained my neck and I had a concussion,
translation.zh: ‎我扭伤了脖子 还得了脑震荡

translation.en: and I go and get checked, turns out I have a sports hernia, and my abdominal, um...
translation.zh:
‎我去检查
‎发现我有运动型疝气 我的腹部…

translation.en: My abdomen is ripped off my pelvic bone.
Coach Beam was, like, "Hey, man,
I know you don't wanna do this, but you might wanna redshirt."
translation.zh:
‎我知道你不愿意
‎但你可能要考虑做红衫球员”

translation.en: That was tough, man,
'cause I saw no light at the end of the tunnel for a long time.
translation.zh:
‎因为我很久都没在
‎隧道前方看到光芒了

translation.en: They had to talk me into accepting the ring
because I felt like I wasn't a part of that State Championship.
translation.zh:
‎因为我本来觉得
‎州冠军和我没什么关系

translation.en: Coach Beam was like, "You helped prepare these guys.
translation.zh:
‎比姆教练说
‎“你帮助这些家伙做好准备

translation.en: You helped us get to a point where they're playing at championship level.
translation.zh: ‎你帮我们到达了能打锦标赛的水平”

translation.en: You're getting a fucking ring.
Go give Sakai your fucking ring size, dude.
translation.zh: ‎去告诉莎凯你的戒指尺寸 兄弟

translation.en: That's not gonna not happen.
You're getting a ring, 'cause you earned it."
translation.zh:
‎你一定要得到一枚戒指
‎因为这是你应得的”

translation.en: I didn't think I would ever play football again.
translation.zh: ‎我以为我不会再打橄榄球了

translation.en: If I'm really bored, I'll just throw this for seven hours.
translation.zh:
‎我很无聊的时候
‎可以这样扔七个小时

translation.en: When I have no one to talk to,
I'm watching clips of myself running routes.
translation.zh: ‎我就看自己跑动路线的视频

translation.en: I'm my own worst critic. I like to watch my stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我很会批评自己 ‎我喜欢看自己的东西

translation.en: Beam's probably my worst critic, if you've ever been in those meetings,
translation.zh:
‎比姆可能最擅长批评我
‎如果你参加过那些会议…

translation.en: but I'm all football.
translation.zh: ‎但我最爱橄榄球 ‎（兰尼橄榄球）

translation.en: I got ripped for, I guess, not being in that area.
translation.zh: ‎我因为没在那个区域被骂惨了

translation.en: He just kept, "What are you doing? What are you doing?"
And I'm like, "Running?"
This is my goals for 2019.
I was like, "I gotta have an insane off-season."
translation.zh:
‎我想：“我要度过一个
‎疯狂的无赛季年度”

translation.en: So, I said, "Go nuts,
show everyone who's watching that you're a baller.
translation.zh: ‎让所有在看的人知道你是个球员

translation.en: Be the football player you've always dreamed of being."
translation.zh: ‎成为你梦想中的橄榄球球员”

translation.en: And all that means to me is... I'm a baller.
translation.zh: ‎这一切都意味着…我是个球员

translation.en: I have a lot of talent, but whether it's been injuries
translation.zh: ‎我很有天赋 可不管是伤病

translation.en: or just me being in my own head,
I haven't always been...
just consistent enough to really be able
to have coaches trust me and invest in me and want to give me the ball.
translation.zh:
‎好让教练们信任我
‎愿意为我投资 让我打球

translation.en: That's what this Friday's all about. Showing everybody what I can do.
translation.zh:
‎这就是这周五的目的
‎让所有人看到我的能力

translation.en: Beam got the Lime scooter discount for the kids.
translation.zh:
‎比姆给孩子们找到了
‎青柠滑板车的折扣

translation.en: -[Bryan] Really? -They get the promo.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-有促销券 ‎（防守线教练 布莱恩科赫兰）

translation.en: [Jeff] Hey!
translation.zh: ‎（防守线教练 布莱恩科赫兰）

translation.en: [Bryan] OC in the house. [Vince] Offensive coordinator in the house.
translation.zh:
‎-进攻协调员来了
‎-进攻协调员进来了

translation.en: [Bryan] It looks like he took a shower.
-Get some... Bartender! -Bartender.
-What are you drinking? -I'll get a shot and a beer.
translation.zh:
‎-你喝什么？
‎-要一小杯烈酒和一杯啤酒

translation.en: What kind of specials we've got going?
-Damn. Cheers. -Cheers.
-To another season, gentlemen. -Cheers.
translation.zh:
‎-为又一个赛季干杯 先生们
‎-干杯

translation.en: I wish it had something to do with us tomorrow, but it doesn't.
translation.zh: ‎我希望明天和我们有关系 但并没有

translation.en: No, nothing.
-Have to wait and see. -Don't like your attitude.
translation.zh:
‎-要等着瞧了
‎-我喜欢你的态度

translation.en: [Vince] How's the offense looking?
I'm very sure we're not ready.
[Vince] Yeah, I'm very sure.
[Josh] You guys gonna score on the first drive?
-Yes. -[Bryan] I want the opening kickoff.
-We'll take the opening kickoff. -I do, too.
[Bryan] Opening kickoff for six.
[Jeff] Here's the thing about Modesto.
Modesto does a lot of chest wide open,
-just go with the spots. -[Vince] They givin' it.
Every year, man, right off the bat, we fuck 'em up.
I hope the same thing happens.
-[Vince] Beam texted you. -[Josh] Did he?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 比姆给你发消息了 ‎-是吗？
‎-你要来我的周年派对吗？

translation.en: [Vince] "You coming to my anniversary party?"
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-你要来我的周年派对吗？

translation.en: -[Josh] Shut the fuck up. -[Vince] Fuck, you better go.
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴 ‎去你的 你还是走吧

translation.en: John Beam, my buddy.
[Josh] You kiss his ass so much.
[Vince] I saw you're first on the list.
-[Vince and Josh laugh] -You and Cindy.
When's the last time you were invited to his house?
translation.zh: ‎你上次被邀请去他家是什么时候？

translation.en: -[Jeff] Our first year. -Yeah.
[Bryan] We got two invites to the White House before we were cut off.
translation.zh:
‎我们被拉黑之前
‎会被邀请去他的白宫两次

translation.en: Apparently, we said some un-PC things.
translation.zh: ‎显然我们说了些政治不正确的话

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, heart in hand ♪
-[player 1] Let's go! -[player 2] Let's go!
Let's go, baby!
[player 3] Let's go!
Go, Rej!
[player 4] One, two, three!
[all] Eagles!
[player 4 singing] ♪ I know some dawgs They ready to hit ♪
translation.zh: ‎我认识一些家伙 他们准备出击了

translation.en: Let's go, baby!
[Coach Beam] It's all about having fun today.
translation.zh: ‎今天的重点是享受 我们说过

translation.en: It's what we talked about. Have some fun with your friends.
translation.zh: ‎今天的重点是享受 我们说过 ‎和朋友们享受乐趣

translation.en: Have some fun with your buddies.
Have some fun with the brothers that you are with each other.
translation.zh: ‎和自己的兄弟一起享受乐趣

translation.en: Friday night in the town, ain't nothing better.
[commentator 1] John Beam, a legend now in his eighth season
translation.zh:
‎约翰比姆
‎已经进入个人第八个赛季的传奇

translation.en: as the head coach, 40 years coaching football.
translation.zh: ‎首席教练 执教橄榄球40年

translation.en: He will try to lead Laney to a victory tonight.
translation.zh: ‎他今晚会努力带领兰尼获得胜利

translation.en: [commentator 2] Two great teams facing off tonight.
translation.zh: ‎今晚对阵的是两支优秀的球队

translation.en: [commentator 1] Modesto lost to Laney last season and they look to return the favor.
translation.zh:
‎莫德斯托上个赛季输给了兰尼
‎他们准备以牙还牙

translation.en: [Josh] Every fucking play, punch these motherfuckers in the goddamn mouth.
translation.zh: ‎每次进攻 揍翻这些混蛋的脸

translation.en: Make them feel what the town is about!
translation.zh: ‎让他们知道城里比赛的厉害！

translation.en: [player] Let's go, baby.
[commentator 1] Starting at wide receiver, they'll be small. Dior Walker is 5'9".
translation.zh:
‎从外接手开始 他们很瘦小 ‎迪奥沃克 1米75的接球手
‎RJ斯登 1米8

translation.en: RJ Stern, he is 5'11".
translation.zh:
‎迪奥沃克 1米75的接球手
‎RJ斯登 1米8

translation.en: Both of their starting receivers don't clear six feet.
translation.zh: ‎开场两名接球手都没超过1米83

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Can we go? I'm trying to play football.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 可以走了吗？我想打橄榄球

translation.en: [commentator 3] Rejzohn Wright was a terror last year
and really helped Laney go ahead and get into the playoffs.
He was very, very important in sealing the deal.
translation.zh: ‎他对最后的比赛结果至关重要

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Let's go. Let's turn this shit up.
Every play, make them feel your pain.
translation.zh: ‎每次进攻都让他们尝到苦头

translation.en: [commentator 3] It's gonna be a well-fought battle between these two outstanding teams.
translation.zh:
‎这两支优秀的队伍
‎将进行一场精彩的对战

translation.en: [player] Live on three! Loud as hell, let's go!
translation.zh: ‎数三下上场！大点声 我们上！

translation.en: -One, two, three! -[players chanting]
[commentator 1] The 24th ranked Pirates of Modesto
and the six-seeded Laney Eagles, the defending national champions.
translation.zh:
‎和守擂全国冠军的
‎6号种子队伍兰尼老鹰队

translation.en: We are underway.
[man] Indians, purple, chief.
[commentator 1] The Eagles will start at the 25-yard line.
-[player 1] Go! -[player 2] Let's go!
[commentator 1] First play of the game from the 25.
translation.zh:
‎第一次进攻从25码线开始
‎球员行动中

translation.en: [Coach Beam] There he is!
[commentator 1] Through to the right side, down field, it is caught.
translation.zh: ‎去了右侧 防守空旷 前场 接住了

translation.en: [player] Hell yeah, Dior.
[commentator 1] That's Dior Walker with his first catch of the season.
translation.zh: ‎迪奥沃克本赛季第一次接球

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Left, left, left!
[commentator 1] Eagle offense not as quick as NASCAR offense of Modesto,
translation.zh:
‎老鹰的进攻可能不像
‎莫德斯托的赛车式进攻那么快

translation.en: but they go right to the line.
[Coach Beam] Presto, let's go!
[commentator 2] Little tempo here. They're giving Modesto a taste of their own medicine.
translation.zh:
‎节奏有点小紧张 他们在对莫德斯托
‎以其人之道还治其人之身

translation.en: You know, if you think negative, you're gonna do negative.
translation.zh: ‎如果想法消极 行动也会消极

translation.en: I mean, I'm sleeping in my car, but... I'm still healthy.
translation.zh: ‎我是在车里睡 但…我还是很健康

translation.en: God gave me the gift to play football,
translation.zh: ‎上帝给了我打橄榄球的天赋

translation.en: and I love where I am, so I really can't complain.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢自己现在的状态
‎所以我真的没法抱怨

translation.en: Do my mom know what's happening right now? No.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈知道发生了什么吗？不知道

translation.en: Am I gonna tell her? No.
I don't need her stressing about me.
She's got four other kids to worry about.
translation.zh: ‎她还要为其他四个孩子操心

translation.en: I don't need her stressing that her son is sleeping in a car.
translation.zh: ‎我不需要她担忧自己的儿子睡在车里

translation.en: She... I told her I'm sleeping at my friends,
translation.zh: ‎她…我跟她说我在朋友家过夜

translation.en: and she's okay with that, so I'm trying to just...
translation.zh: ‎她没意见 所以我就努力…

translation.en: I'm trying to help her out, too, 'cause I know...
translation.zh: ‎我也努力想帮她 因为我知道…

translation.en: I know the situation over there is not the best, too, so...
translation.zh: ‎我知道她那边情况也不好 所以…

translation.en: I figured I'd get my stuff.
Shit.
